nodes.text: The Corellia Mining Corporation was a mining company from the planet Corellia that produced sandcrawlers and the Goji-DF "Turtle Tanker". A number of the corporation's sandcrawlers were brought to the desert planet Tatooine during a mining boom, where they were later abandoned and taken over by Jawa clans at some point prior to 22 BBY.

The Corellia Mining Corporation was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars Encyclopedia of Starfighters and Other Vehicles, which was written by Landry Q. Walker. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1998 game guide Star Wars: Rogue Squadron: The Official Nintendo Player's Guide.
